alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 10:07AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northern Nassau, western Camden and east central Charlton Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1007 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Woodbine, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodbine, Kings Ferry, Tarboro and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton
